abstract: berkeley police seek help in identifying sexual battery suspect .
article: oakland -- berkeley police are asking for the public 's help in identifying the suspect in the sexual battery of a jogger near berkeley bowl west in west berkeley on a sunday morning earlier this month , police said . police said the woman was jogging on a sidewalk in the area of heinz avenue and ninth street at about 9 a. m. on dec. . 10 when the suspect approached her from behind and grabbed her buttocks . police describe the suspect as a hispanic male adult in his 30s who was wearing a baseball cap and blue pants .

surveillance photo of man suspected in a sexual battery near heinz avenue and ninth street in berkeley on december 9 , 2017 . a surveillance camera in the area captured imagery of the suspect as he fled the area . berkeley police said anyone who has information about the suspect or may have been a witness to the crime should call their special victims unit at 981-5715 .
